segments.text: I see the woman focused on her plate, oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water spills over the edge of the sink, pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, in contrast, are fully aware of what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching into the cookie jar, balancing precariously on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it amusing how the girl raises her arm, waiting for her cookie like it's an expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene feels like a ticking time bomb ready to go off.
segments.speaker: PAR
